title: The Lurking Fear and Other Stories
description: Stark horror stalks a universe of fantasy• The Lurking FearA demon, ratlike scurrying from pits remote and imaginable... a loathsome night-spawned flood of - what?• In the Vault A dark and dank crypt where bodies waiting for burial wreak a terrible vengeance on the undertaker...• The Unnamable A vile and terrible being that claws its human victims and gouges them with its horns...These and other marrow-chilling delights await the connoisseur of the horror story in this collection by the master of the macabre and malevolent.
author: H.P. Lovecraft
